Plot: A romantic comedy centered on the daily lives of five Lebanese women living in Beirut.
Title: Caramel
Writer: Nadine Labaki (idea), Jihad Hojeily (idea), Nadine Labaki (screenplay), Jihad Hojeily (screenplay), Rodney El Haddad (screenplay)
Actors: Nadine Labaki, Yasmine Al Massri, Joanna Moukarzel, Gisèle Aouad
tomatoConsensus: Caramel is both an astute cultural study, and a charming comedic drama from a talented newcomer.
